name: Ekho
description:
Ekho is a 2D side-scrolling platforming adventure in which the player’s ability to change their elemental skills plays a key role in defeating enemies and overcoming obstacles. Play as Ekho the nymph and use her ability to absorb enemy attacks to gain special elemental abilities that can help her defeat her foes and navigate her environment as she tries to stop the darkness spread by vengeful Hera. 

Controls

XBox Controller (Recommended)
Left Stick - Move
Right Stick - Aim (Vine Grapple)
Right Trigger / B - Absorb/ Elemental Attack Ability
Left Trigger / X - Elemental Utility Ability
A - Jump
Y - Drop Ability
Start - Pause

Mouse and Keyboard
WASD - Move
Space - Jump
Right Click - Absorb/ Elemental Attack Ability
Left Click - Elemental Utility Ability
Mouse Cursor - Aim (Vine Grapple)
Shift - Drop Ability
Esc - Pause
